parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Probably another form of biazo; to squeeze, i.e. Seize (press), or officially (arrest), or in hunting (capture).

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
On the right hand, right hand, right. From dechomai; the right side or hand.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I wake, arouse, (b) I raise up. Probably akin to the base of agora; to waken, i.e. Rouse.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Instantly, immediately, on the spot. From para and chrema; at the thing itself, i.e. Instantly.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A step; hence: a foot. From baino; a pace, i.e. the foot.
The ankle bone. Neuter of a presumed derivative probably of the same as sphaira; the ankle.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To strengthen, confirm, establish, settle. From stereos; to solidify, i.e. Confirm.
